bio: Create a fantasy mountain and sea world, combine OP blockchain technology for rights confirmation and NFT promotion.
contributionDescription: Our team participated in the early testing of OP and is now developing our magical card game based on OP technology. Our project is still in the development and testing stage, and we need some financial support to link our game characters and in-game assets together. We hope to receive your help. We are committed to web3
impactDescription: Our team participated in the early testing of OP and is now developing our magical card game based on OP technology. Our project is still in the development and testing stage, and we need some financial support to link our game characters and in-game assets together. We hope to receive your help. We are committed to web3

fundingSources.description: To develop our creativity, please ask the project team for help.

pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged because it violates the rule against promises of future impact as the applicant has stated that their project is still in the development and testing stage, implying future deliverables.
pwCategorySuggestions: Blockchain Gaming, NFTs, Funding, Web3 Community Platform, Tokenization Platforms
